oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gernert Homes at 12th Avenue South and Edgehill, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the I.W. Gernert Homes (Project Tenn. 5-14), near 12th Avenue South and Edgehill Avenue, not dated. The Gernert Homes were completed in 1965, and they were the city's first low-rent housing project for the elderly. The high-rise building contains 90 efficiency apartments and 18 one-bedroom apartments. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
